alert.note: Alert for Allen; Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wilson, eastern Woodson and northwestern Allen Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Altoona, or near Fredonia, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 55 mph, penny size hail, deadly lightning, locally very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fredonia, Altoona, Buffalo, Neosho Falls, Benedict, Rose and Piqua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
